title: Ethos Shift: From Debt to Trust Investment
summary: Foundational shift in the fund's strategy. Moving away from a 'debt-collection' mindset towards a model of 'value invested' into a collective Trust. This redefines how beneficiary funds are managed and audited.

title: Onboarding: The Sovereign Shared Brain & Hybrid AI
summary: Master guide for Team Members and Trustees on our AI-assisted transparency and intelligence re-integration systems.

title: Welcome to the Shared Brain
summary: Introduction to the collective intelligence layer for the Gaza Resilience Fund team. Explains the concept of Sovereign AI and how team members can access project knowledge.
